title: 我成功的把1.3虐出翔了
author: xjj123tmd
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception in server tick loop
This error has been saved to E:\minecreaft\Minecraft_1.3\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-08-02_08.38.33-server.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.

先是单机被踢出服务器。。。然后就再也读不出地图了。。。
